TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventHandler(object sender, ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventArgs)
public delegate void ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventArgs ^ e);
type ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventHandler = delegate of obj * ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The source of the event, the .
An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用顯示篩選過的資料控制權傳輸至中介層商務物件中擷取資料，然後使用控制項來顯示結果。The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data by using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object, and then using a control to display the results. 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例會使用的中介層商務物件的範例。The second code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that is used by the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用顯示篩選過的資料控制權傳輸至中介層商務物件中擷取資料，然後使用控制項來顯示結果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data by using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object, and then using a control to display the results. 控制項可以篩選資料，擷取資料的方法會擷取它時，才或物件。The control can filter data only when the method that retrieves the data retrieves it as a or object. 基於這個理由，屬性會識別會以擷取資料的商務物件方法或物件。For this reason, the property identifies a business object method that retrieves data as a or object. 在程式碼範例所組成控制項中，控制項，控制項，和**提交** 按鈕。The code example consists of a control, a control, the control, and a **Submit** button. 根據預設，控制項填入其中一個 Northwind traders 員工的名稱。By default, the control is populated with the name of one of the employees at Northwind Traders. 控制項會顯示中的名稱所識別之員工的相關資訊。The control displays information about the employee who is identified by the name in the . 若要在另一位員工，擷取資料控制項中，輸入員工的完整名稱，然後按一下**送出** 按鈕。To retrieve data for another employee, in the control, type the full name of the employee, and then click the **Submit** button. 屬性會指定用來篩選所指定之方法所擷取的資料運算式屬性。The property specifies an expression that is used to filter the data that is retrieved by the method that is specified by the property. 它會使用參數預留位置中所包含的參數評估集合。It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters that are contained in the collection. 在此範例中，參數替代符號是單引號 （'） 括住，因為參數類型是字串類型，其中可能包含空格。In this example, the parameter placeholder is enclosed by single quotation marks (') because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果參數的型別是數值或日期，則不需要引號。If the type of the parameter is numeric or date, quotation marks are not required. 集合包含一個參數，也繫結至的物件控制項。The collection contains one parameter, a object that is bound to the control. 如果未指定名稱中控制項，將新的參數新增至集合以便搜尋已成功。If no name is specified in the control, a new parameter is added to the collection so that the search is successful. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供上述的程式碼範例使用的中介層商務物件的範例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 此程式碼範例包含兩個基本類別︰`EmployeeLogic`和`NorthwindEmployee`。The code example consists of two basic classes: `EmployeeLogic` and `NorthwindEmployee`. `EmployeeLogic`類別會封裝商務邏輯和`NorthwindEmployee`類別是包含只載入和保存資料層中的資料所需的基本功能的模型類別。The `EmployeeLogic` class encapsulates business logic and the `NorthwindEmployee` class is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 為了簡單起見，`EmployeeLogic`類別會建立一組靜態的資料，而不是從資料層擷取資料。For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier. 如需完整的實用範例，您必須編譯，並使用這些類別所提供的 Web Form 程式碼範例。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the Web Forms code examples that are provided. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/northwindemployee9.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/northwindemployee9.vb#2)]
